apuntador.txtlibre01: The fields are the basis of a table, it is therefore necessary to determine the correct value type must have, also through the format that we can apply according to our requirements. We will see what is an input mask and its relation to income or entering values ??in a field. At the end of the unit will present the importance of validation rules within a query. We will be able to customize a field according to our viewing requirements.
